title: Relates to the crime of unauthorized use of a motor vehicle
summary: Adds "other motor vehicle related crimes as predicate crimes" which may increase punishment for unauthorized use of a motor vehicle in the second degree when one is convicted of such crimes within the preceding ten years.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         2900

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 21, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by M. of A. CYMBROWITZ, CASTRO, DenDEKKER -- Multi-Sponsored
         by -- M. of A.  PHEFFER, ROBINSON -- read once  and  referred  to  the
         Committee on Codes

       AN  ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to the crime of unauthorized
         use of a motor vehicle in the second degree

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1. Section 165.06 of the penal law, as amended by chapter 413
    2  of the laws of 1982, is amended to read as follows:
    3  S 165.06 Unauthorized use of a vehicle in the second degree.
    4    A person is guilty of unauthorized use of  a  vehicle  in  the  second
    5  degree when:
    6    He  commits  the  crime  of unauthorized use of a vehicle in the third
    7  degree as defined in subdivision one of section 165.05 of  this  article
    8  and  has been previously convicted of the crime of unauthorized use of a
    9  vehicle in the third degree as defined in  subdivision  one  of  section
   10  165.05 or FIRST OR second [degree] DEGREES, AUTO STRIPPING, GRAND LARCE-
   11  NY OF A MOTOR VEHICLE, CRIMINAL POSSESSION OF A MOTOR VEHICLE OR ILLEGAL
   12  POSSESSION  OF  A VEHICLE IDENTIFICATION NUMBER within the preceding ten
   13  years.
   14    Unauthorized use of a vehicle in the second degree is a class E  felo-
   15  ny.
   16    S 2. This act shall take effect on the first of November next succeed-
   17  ing the date on which it shall have become a law.



        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD07788-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to the crime of unauthorized use of a motor vehicle in the second degree
